author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Tickets on sale for ‘Wild & Precious’
text:
Tickets on sale for ‘Wild & Precious’ Sep 28, 2015 Steve Cadwell 
Rockland — OUT As I Want To Be will present Steve Cadwell’s acclaimed one-man performance “Wild & Precious” Sunday, Oct. 18, at 1 p.m. at the Strand Theatre, 345 Main St. 
Cadwell is a Boston-based psychotherapist who has been listening to people's stories for 35 years, to good healing effect. “Wild & Precious” is his story — one man's version of gay liberation’s social change history celebrated in original song, story, poetry, costume and photos. 
Tickets are $20, free for those younger than 19. They are available via the Strand at 594-0070 or rocklandstrand.com . One hundred percent of the event’s proceeds will benefit OUT, a nonprofit advocacy organization dedicated to the support and empowerment of LGBTQ young people in Midcoast Maine. For more information, visit outmidcoast.org . 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
